events.name: InventoryItemAdded
events.description: To track new items in inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemRemoved
events.description: To manage and track the removal of items from inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemUpdated
events.description: To allow updates to existing items, reflecting changes in quantity or details.

events.name: InventoryReportGenerated
events.description: To provide insights into current inventory status and trends.

events.name: InventoryItemReserved
events.description: To reserve items for a specific order or customer.

events.name: InventoryItemUnreserved
events.description: To unreserve items that are no longer needed.

commands.name: AddInventoryItem
commands.description: To track new items in inventory.

commands.name: RemoveInventoryItem
commands.description: To manage and track the removal of items from inventory.

commands.name: UpdateInventoryItem
commands.description: To allow updates to existing items, reflecting changes in quantity or details.

commands.name: GenerateInventoryReport
commands.description: To provide insights into current inventory status and trends.

commands.name: ReserveInventoryItem
commands.description: To reserve items for a specific order or customer.

commands.name: UnreserveInventoryItem
commands.description: To unreserve items that are no longer needed.

integrationPoints.name: OrderManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration needed to synchronize inventory with order processing.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration required to update inventory based on supplier deliveries.
